name: koel
description: Koel is a web based personal music streaming server. It scans local audio files and serves them through a clean web player and mobile friendly UI, allowing users to enjoy their collection from anywhere while keeping full control of the files.
features: Music Streaming: Stream your personal music collection from anywhere via web player. Access your library remotely.
Library Scanning: Automatic music library scanning with metadata and album art fetching. Organize music effortlessly.
Web Player: Beautiful, responsive web player with modern interface. Enjoy music on any device.
Playlist Management: Create custom playlists and smart playlists with rules. Curate your listening experience.
Queue Management: Build and manage playback queue with drag-and-drop. Control what plays next.
Search & Filter: Find songs, albums, and artists quickly with advanced search. Navigate large libraries easily.
Last.fm Integration: Scrobble plays to Last.fm for tracking and recommendations. Connect with music community.
Multi-User: Individual user accounts with personal playlists and preferences. Share server with family.
Mobile Friendly: Responsive design optimized for smartphones and tablets. Listen on the go.
Audio Formats: Support for MP3, FLAC, AAC, and other common formats. Play your entire collection.
Visualizer: Audio visualizer for enhanced listening experience. Watch music come alive.
Keyboard Shortcuts: Control playback with keyboard shortcuts for power users. Navigate efficiently.
